DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose present study evaluate dental implant placement use two different CBCT-derived template study related factor affect accuracy support clinical application technique . Thirty patient partial edentulous denture recruit . They randomize two group . A radiographic guide prepare CT/CBCT scan . The CT/CBCT scan DICOM ﬁles load plan program convert 3D computer image . A surgical template fabricate virtual planning . After 6 week , implant judge stable , patient option replace ﬁxed prosthesis . Patients recall oral hygiene maintenance prosthetic control every 6 month entire duration study .
DOC.brief_title: Accuracy Dental Implant Placement Using Two Different CBCT-derived Templates
DOC.criteria: Partial edentulism Missing three teeth succession Presence adjacent teeth Systemically healthy Good maxillomandibular relation Maximal mouth opening＞5 mm Poor oral hygiene Severe parafunctional habit , example , bruxing clench Presence clinically active periodontal disease express probe pocket depths≥4 mm combination bleed probe Maxillary sinus involvement Conditions might lead possibly lowered regenerative capacity bone , example , osteoporosis Paget 's disease Pregnant expect pregnant History drug alcohol abuse History systemic disease would contraindicate oral surgical treatment , example , uncontrolled diabetes ( define HBA1c level > 7 % ) Radiotherapy head neck area On certain medication like bisphosphonates steroid currently within past three month Unwillingness return followup examination Smokers ( than20 cigarette per day ) . Subjects smoke < 20 cigarette per day request stop smoking surgery
